---
title: "Penguin Bills"
format: dashboard
---

```{python}
import plotly.express as px
tips = px.data.tips()
```

## Row 

```{python}
#| title: Smokers and Tips
px.violin(
  tips, y="tip", x="smoker", color="sex", box=True, 
  points="all", hover_data=tips.columns
)
```

## Row 

```{python}
#| title: Tips and Bill Total
px.histogram(
  tips, x="total_bill", y="tip", color="sex", 
  marginal="rug", hover_data=tips.columns
)
```

```{python}
#| title: Smokers vs. Non-Smokers
px.box(
  tips, x="day", y="total_bill", color="smoker", 
  notched=True
)
```
